Blessure mineure.name: Light wound
Blessure mineure.description:
The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to one characteristic of the GM’s choosing.

No other lasting effect.

Borgne.name: One eye blinded
Borgne.description: The PC is blinded in one eye and suffers a 1 point penalty to their Ranged and Acuity characteristic scores.

Bras mutilé.name: Mangled arm
Bras mutilé.description:
The character can no longer use weapons with the heavy or two hands effects.

The GM must increase the difficulty of all skill checks hindered by having only one arm.

Cerveau touché.name: Damaged brain
Cerveau touché.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to all characteristic scores linked to Beast, Machine, Lady, and Mask aspects, and has to forfeit an action of their choice each conflict phase.

Colonne vertébrale brisée.name: Broken spine
Colonne vertébrale brisée.description: The character loses use of their legs. Any skill check that requires functioning legs to perform fails automatically.

Colonne vertébrale touchée.name: Damaged spine
Colonne vertébrale touchée.description: The PC suffers a 2 point penalty to all characteristic scores linked to the Flesh, Beast, and Mask aspects.

Côtes brisées.name: Broken ribs
Côtes brisées.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to their Endurance and Combat characteristic scores.

Crâne brisé.name: Fractured skull
Crâne brisé.description: The character loses 1 point in all skills linked to the Machine, Lady, and Mask aspects.

Dos brisé.name: Broken back
Dos brisé.description: The PC loses 1 point in all skills linked to the Flesh and Beast aspects.

Dos touché.name: Damaged back
Dos touché.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to their Strength and Movement characteristic scores.

Hémorragie interne.name: Internal bleeding
Hémorragie interne.description: The character will bleed out and die if they are not healed for at least 1 health point in the next minute.

Jambe mutilée.name: Mangled leg
Jambe mutilée.description:
The PC can no longer walk, run, or jump.

The GM must increase the difficulty of all skill checks hindered by having only one leg.

Mâchoire, langue et dents détruites.name: Smashed jaw, teeth, tongue
Mâchoire, langue et dents détruites.description: The PC suffers a 3 point penalty to all characteristic scores linked to the Lady aspect. They can no longer communicate by speech.

Main brisée.name: Crushed hand
Main brisée.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to their Combat, Tech, Ranged, and Dexterity characteristic scores.

Oreille éclatée.name: Burst eardrum
Oreille éclatée.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to their Acuity, Movement, and Instinct characteristic scores.

Organes internes touchés.name: Damaged internal organs
Organes internes touchés.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to all their characteristic scores.

Pied brisé.name: Crushed foot
Pied brisé.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to their Combat, Movement, Stealth, and Strength characteristic scores.

Poumons perforés.name: Punctured lungs
Poumons perforés.description: The PC suffers a 2 point penalty to their Endurance and Movement characteristic scores.

Rien !.name: Nothing!
Rien !.description: The PC suffers no additional effect, other than being at death’s door.

Tempe touchée.name: Minor concussion
Tempe touchée.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to their Aggression and Composure characteristic scores.

Traumatisme crânien.name: Severe concussion
Traumatisme crânien.description: The PC suffers a 1 point penalty to their Knowledge, Tech, and Instinct characteristic scores.

Yeux détruits.name: Blinded
Yeux détruits.description:
The character completely loses their eyesight. The character can no longer see.

The GM must increase the difficulty of all skill checks hindered by blindness.
